caption.p: A) Transmission electron micrograph detail of a ZIKV-infected LLC-MK2 cell. The large arrow points out an area containing typical flavivirus-induced paracrystalline arrays/convoluted membranes in a ZIKV-infected LLC-MK2 cell. (B) Transmission electron micrograph detail of ZIKV-infected LLC-MK2 cell. Crystalline arrays of virus cores (large arrow) are shown in association with membrane vesicles.
